n":[{"data":{"id":"d1muduyiupc0","created":1717058346858,"text":"外部中断(硬件)","expandState":"collapse"},"children":[{"data":{"id":"d1nsazmwxag0","created":1717154039684,"text":"可屏蔽中断INTR"},"children":[]},{"data":{"id":"d1nsb0ji1oo0","created":1717154041655,"text":"不可屏蔽中断NMI"},"children":[]}]},{"data":{"id":"d1mudwaev8o0","created":1717058349754,"text":"内部异常","expandState":"collapse"},"children":[{"data":{"id":"d1mueg4mezs0","created":1717058392939,"text":"软件中断","expandState":"collapse"},"children":[{"data":{"id":"d1mufr3qty80","created":1717058495195,"text":"故障","expandState":"collapse"},"children":[{"data":{"id":"d1muh1murs00","created":1717058596482,"text":"自己写的指令"},"children":[]}]},{"data":{"id":"d1mufs7jsdc0","created":1717058497602,"text":"自陷","expandState":"collapse"},"children":[{"data":{"id":"d1muh79scg00","created":1717058608753,"text":"系统调用"},"children":[]}]}]},{"data":{"id":"d1muexa77480","created":1717058430282,"text":"硬件中断","expandState":"collapse"},"children":[{"data":{"id":"d1mug7ruvz40","created":1717058531482,"text":"终止"},"children":[]}]}]}]}]},{"data":{"id":"d1muj4z7h340","created":1717058760488,"text":"操作系统结构","expandState":"collapse"},"children":[{"data":{"id":"d1mujdppck80","created":1717058779504,"text":"分层法"},"children":[]},{"data":{"id":"d1mujxwy1dc0","created":1717058823478,"text":"模块化"},"children":[]},{"data":{"id":"d1muk8o7e740","created":1717058846894,"text":"宏内核和微内核"},"children":[]}]},{"data":{"id":"d1muq9mgihs0","created":1717059319150,"text":"虚拟机","expandState":"collapse"},"children":[{"data":{"id":"d1muqvy826o0","created":1717059367751,"text":"第一类虚拟机管理程序"},"children":[]},{"data":{"id":"d1muqwwmkw00","created":1717059369831,"text":"第二类虚拟机管理程序"},"children":[]}]}]},{"data":{"id":"d1mtjbmprtk0","created":1717055953860,"text":"进程与线程","expandState":"collapse"},"children":[{"data":{"id":"d1muu4k41qg0","created":1717059621581,"text":"进程与线程","expandState":"collapse"},"children":[{"data":{"id":"d1nsdrvxlbs0","created":1717154257908,"text":"进程的概念与特怔","expandState":"collapse"},"children":[{"data":{"id":"d1nseocfyj40","created":1717154328563,"text":"进程是进程实体的运行过程，是资源分配和调度的独立单位"},"children":[]},{"data":{"id":"d1nsgbekhvs0","created":1717154457122,"text":"动态性，并发性，独立性，异步性"},"children":[]},{"data":{"id":"d1nshas1yfc0","created":1717154534125,"text":"进程由进程控制块，程序段，数据段组成"},"children":[]},{"data":{"id":"d1nsibvkm800","created":1717154614878,"text":"进程有五个状态运行态，阻塞态，就绪态，创建态，终止态"},"children":[]},{"data":{"id":"d1nspjy6w680","created":1717155181000,"text":"进程的通信分为共享存储，消息传递，管道通信"},"children":[]},{"data":{"id":"d1nswdh2kps0","created":1717155715453,"text":"线程"},"children":[]}]}]},{"data":{"id":"d1muu6xc0o00","created":1717059626734,"text":"cpu调度","expandState":"collapse"},"children":[{"data":{"id":"d1ntccptjts0","created":1717156967632,"text":"调度的层次分为高级调度(作业调度)，中级调度(内存调度)，低级调度(进程调度)"},"children":[]},{"data":{"id":"d1ok77pee740","created":1717232734870,"text":"调度器分为排队器，分派器，上下文切换器"},"children":[]},{"data":{"id":"d1ok99b2low0","created":1717232895085,"text":"进程调度的方式分为非抢占调度方式和抢占调度方式"},"children":[]},{"data":{"id":"d1oke5mnivk0","created":1717233278899,"text":"调度算法评价的标准主要有cpu利用率，系统吞吐量，周转时间，等待时间，响应时间"},"children":[]},{"data":{"id":"d1okmld8vew0","created":1717233940072,"text":"调度算法分为先来先服务算法(FCFS)调度算法，短作业优先调度算法(SJF)和短进程优先(SPF)可以是抢占式的，高响比优先调度算法，优先调度算法，时间片轮转算法，多级队列调度算法，多级反馈队列调度算法"},"children":[]}]},{"data":{"id":"d1muu7z5w5k0","created":1717059629022,"text":"同步与互斥","expandState":"collapse"},"children":[{"data":{"id":"d1ph4o728io0","created":1717325632301,"text":"同步与互斥的基本概念","expandState":"collapse"},"children":[{"data":{"id":"d1pguwpw2140","created":1717324867212,"text":"一次仅让一个进程使用的资源叫临界资源"},"children":[]},{"data":{"id":"d1pgvu4687s0","created":1717324939909,"text":"同步也叫直接制约关系，源于进程之间的合作"},"children":[]},{"data":{"id":"d1pgvvx6qps0","created":1717324943840,"text":"互斥也叫间接制约关系，源于对临界资源的访问"},"children":[]},{"data":{"id":"d1ph10ww5x40","created":1717325346527,"text":"实现临界区要遵循的原则-空闲让进，忙则等待，有限等待，让权等待"},"children":[]}]},{"data":{"id":"d1ph32kq9
